matrix-project.description:
Build squawk in several configurations, with FLASH_MEMORY=TRUE and ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=FALSE:
  • ASSERTIONS_ENABLED
  • DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED
  • FLOATS
Can't actually run FLASH_MEMORY builds on desktop, due to different channel operations, etc.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd trunk java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar -DFLASH_MEMORY=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=false -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED java -jar build.jar -DFLASH_MEMORY=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=false -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata cldc imp debugger ls -l > sizereport.txt java -jar build.jar clean
